messages.title: A better plan. A better future.
messages.content: As your MP, I will be a strong voice for our city, its residents and businesses. I will work tirelessly to make sure our city gets a fair deal in terms of funding and services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The leaflet criticizes the current 'Bedroom Tax' and proposes a 'Mansion Tax' instead.

issues.economy: Labour's pledge to guarantee a job to all 18-24-year-olds out of work for a year and cut tuition fees to Â£6,000 a year. State that every policy is fully funded without additional borrowing.
issues.education: Raising school standards by protecting the entire education budget.
issues.health: Supporting the NHS to improve services and recruit more doctors and nurses.

images.caption: Image captions highlight community engagement and support for education, economy, and health services.
